# Handgrip strength predicts physical and psychological domains of quality of life, but not social and environmental domains.

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository consists of scripts related of data analysis of the research that investigated the association between handgrip strength with quality of life in different domains of quality of life.

The research was published in the Brazilian Journal of Global Health and can be checked in detail in the [link](https://periodicos.unisa.br/index.php/saudeglobal/article/view/532)
